reviews.review: Counter-Strike: Source has very good maps, graphics and gameplay. There are people playing it, you just have to find a good server for the original and best experience. I have even hosted my own server since I have had the opportunity to do so and it has been very fun.
It doesn't have battle royale and you can run it on a potato
Much easier than GO, will stay!

I remember playing the original Counter Strike back when I was just 4-5 years old. I obviously sucked at it, but I nonetheless loved it and played it pretty extensively throughout the years. However, I stopped playing a few years ago. I decided to pick this up on sale, and Counter Strike is still as good as it was all those years ago. From what I understand, this Source version is basically the same game as the original, but with updated graphics and physics. The tension in your typical match is still a major highlight of this game, and while I still suck, I have countless fun regardless. Not to mention the countless modded servers such as Zombie Escape. I have played a few hours of CS:GO, but it just didn't grasp me like this game does. There are no loot boxes or any bizarre microtransactions in here, it runs better and is overall more optimized, and the community is not as toxic. The player base is still very active (even if you have to look through many empty servers) so don't be concerned about a lack of a player base. Overall, I love this game and it is still just as fun as it was back in it's prime. If you have never tried this game out, pick it up on sale and I reckon you will get countless hours out of it like I did.

I know I might be a little late, since this game came out in 2004, first of November, but I have to say It's a very fun game. I really like the AI, the ragdoll physics, voicechat mechanic for the AI, for me it just make's the game more fun with AI. So, yeah, overall a pretty fun game to play alone, or with friends.

P.S: I know, still 14 years late.

Очень очень очень очень хорошая яяя яяя яяя я я играааа

Что я могу сказать про игру?  Первое что я хочу сказать, эта лучшая часть из всей серии "Counter-Strike". 

А теперь по пунктам:
Графика:
Хорошая графика, можно настроить по вашему вкусу, и по усмотрению. 
Но есть и минусы:
Если на высоких настройках вы ещё и включите Bloom, то будет сильно резать глаза своей яркостью. Не удобно когда выходишь из тёмного помещения, и вдали враг, и пока вы будете концентрироваться на свете, вас 300 раз убьют. Но, к этому можно привыкнуть, но если проблемы со зрением, не советую ставить Bloom.

Управление:
Как в 1.6, практически ничего не поменялось. А в целом, оно удобное. Но стоит упомянуть про мышь. Да, вот с ней я советую поработать. Установите сенсу так чтобы было удобно вам.

Геймплей:

Ооо, то за что я люблю игру.  Он реально захватывающий и иетересный. Поскольку это вас не CS  1.6, а игра на новом движке, то стоет привыкнуть к гранатами, физике, распрыжке, и так далее. Скажу сразу, за 2 дня вы обязательно привыкните к игре.

Комьюнити:
Ну... Не рекомендую пользоваться голосовым чатом если вы - школьник. В игре комьюнити серьезное и злое. 
Новичков там не любят. Вообщем... Мне нечего сказать.

Итог;
9/10.
Рекомендую поиграть в неё, не пожалеете!

As an ex. CSGO player with one thousand hours what I can say is that this game is very nice. This game still lives with his old-school community: no toxic players that makes you rage quit, no skin nor cases that makes you pay more than the actual knife, no freaking updates like changing the recoil 5 ♥♥♥♥ing times or the sound that ♥♥♥♥♥ you and more importantly PROPER VAC SYSTEM. I played on 5 different servers and no one had a ♥♥♥♥ing cheat. Also, csgo is free when older games like CS 1.6 and Source are still paid?? wtf man get a break. Maybe valve had this idea switch to the older games to pay them even more. But cs classic and source are not bad imo.

[i]The first CS game I ever got introduced to.[/i]
I spent countless hours on this game with my brother, when I was younger, and it was truly a blast.
I don't think the servers are as packed now as they were back then, but if you're looking for the "classic" experience without all the skins from the CS:GO this game would be my go to.
